paragraphs: Hello! I'm Adhithya Srivatsan, currently pursuing B.Tech in AI and DS at Shiv Nadar University.
I've been captivated by coding since 9th grade, leading me to dive into web development and nurture aspirations of becoming a data scientist.

I've built this website to showcase my coding journey. Eager to embrace every coding challenge, I invite you to explore my projects, and don't forget to check out the code on my GitHub â€” the links are under my pinned projects.
